features: Adjustable design - fully adjustable swing arm easily positions for focused, directional lighting
Versatile placement options - attached clamp for desktop mounting and versatility
Long reach - extensive 36-inch reach easily clears monitors and other objects
Flicker-free light zone that is clear of shadows, halos and troublesome glares
body.description: While this Bostitch adjustable swing arm desk silver lamp may not have an ordinary base, it features a fully functional and versatile clip on base! It has a clamp at the bottom to easily mount or attach it to your desk, workbench or table's edge. The long, multi-joint arm allows this clamp on desk lamp to reach 36 inches high and adjusts to achieve any position. Whether you're looking for the perfect lamp for your home office, reading or study time or even for crafts, no surface goes unlit as this lamp easily clears monitors and large surface tops. Each clamp lamp has an all metal construction to provide durability and longevity. It even comes ready to use as it includes a replaceable LED light bulb for brilliant lighting in any room with the quick plug in at any electric outlet. This lamp takes on a minimalist, classic look, making it easy to incorporate it into any office, dorm or classroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I'd recently bought a different brand of this same style swing-arm/clamp desk lamp and was extremely peeved to discover the nuts used to tighten the lamp into the desired position did NOT tighten at all. They just spun like a Fidget Spinner! Both the arm joint and the lamp head could only hang loose. Totally useless! So I looked for a better brand and found this one. The dimensions are right, the color is right, the lamp works fine AND IMPORTANTLY the thing stays in the position I want. It moves smoothly and can be re-set to a new height or angle, and the nuts tighten as intended. Problem solved for an even better price than the one that didn't stay put. Globe Electric is the brand to avoid; Bostitch the one to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: With a long reach and a bright bulb, this light made our large work table much easier to use. The dual mounts are a nice option. The quality looks very good and should last a long time. Shipping was fast too, even during the holidays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly What I Expected
reviews.reviewText: I purchased a "Damaged Package But Like-New" version of this lamp for a slight discount. The lamp arrived a full day early and despite the battered package it was indeed like new, as promised. All the parts were there. No instructions were provided, but honestly, really? It's a lamp, guys! As advertised, an LED bulb was included.I had another version of this lamp still in service, that I ended up giving to my friend, Vinnie, a retired racing pigeon. That lamp now shines over his nest with a special UV lamp, and he seems very satisfied with the whole setup.I did away with the whole clamp thingy and mounted this new lamp's base directly to my well worn desk, using two screws diagonally in the mounting holes of the lamp's plastic base. I positioned new base to cover the holes from the previous base mounted there. There will be zero issues with this lamp's attachment to my desk! Done Deal!Next came the shade. I didn't care for the way the shade secured to the fixture housing. Any little bump and the shade falls down around the bulb. Annoying as hell; it would drive me buggy over the long haul! I fixed this by twisting the shade into place as intended, and then shooting two self-tapping screws into the "dimples" already stamped into the fixture housing. This secured the shade in place, and with all the silver hardware already on the lamp, the fix looks factory. Again, done deal!The included LED bulb is bright enough, but it has that blue-cast, which I hate. Not only is it ugly, but the blue spectrum of light is the least optimal for your vision. I replaced the bulb with an even brighter, warm-white LED, and all is right with my world.Tip: The switches on these things are cheap and they fail. But LED bulbs run hot at their bases and cool at their tips. So leave the switch on and just give the bulb a half turn, to turn the lamp on and off! Don't crank it down too tight when turning it on. Don't crank it back too little when turning it off. A full half turn for on, and a full half turn for off. No switch failures--ever. Done Deal!The lamp is cheaply made, that's just a fact. But the build is adequate for my use, and it's not ugly. It's worst bugaboos can be easily fixed or worked around. And it is inexpensive. And right now there's not a whole lot else out there. Hell, I just ordered another one!UPDATE: The second "Like-New Repackaged" Lamp (at a slight discount) arrived on time, and did not disappoint, as its condition was ostensibly flawless. The shade on this particular lamp secured tightly enough that no extra measures were necessary. The lamp's base fit the previous lamp's mount well enough, so I was home-free on that account too. The LED bulb that was supposed to be included was missing, but since the supplied bulb has that ugly blue-shifted light, I would've replaced it anyway, so I did not complain. Again, these are not commercial-grade lamps, and are best suited for light duty around the home, though as I type this, Vinnie continues to enjoy his! I'll try to attach a pic, later!RayB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Product, Sketchy Packaging and Handling
reviews.reviewText: The lamp is perfect for my needs--well-made, sturdy, somewhat old school (which is what I wanted), a basic tried and true design, and they even included a light bulb, fancy that! The only problem was that the box it came in somehow got damaged and appeared to have been opened and closed with tape. Not pretty. When I inspected the lamp, I noticed the "flawlessly" painted metal shade had a half-inch scratch. I kept the attractive, affordable lamp since the small defect was on the back, and I'd rarely see it. The instructions documents looked like they had been shoved in the box haphazardly. Still, I'm OK with the product. It looks fine clamped to my desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great light for close up work, but the stand is really cheap and comes apart very easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for an adjustable light for the outside bar-b-que. I wasn't happy with the lights currently listed for sale, not bright enough and didn'tlike the mounts and they just look cheap. So I bought this desk light for the Bar-b-que. I also bought a brighter LED bulb. I was lucky because of the design of our bar-b-qur. On a side shelf there are slots. I took off the nut and clamp then slid the threaded shaft through the slot. Installed the clamp and nut on the threaded shaft and hand tightened the base onto the grill shelf. I know this lamp isn't designed for outside use. When it fails I'll fix it. It's a 20$ light with easy-to-use components and is easily repaired or replaced. We use our Bar-b-que alot. Our outdoor lights do not shine sufficiently into the grill after sunset. Eliminating or improving the switch on the lamp to an out door rated switch turns this lamp into a great light for my needs.Durability: I'm not expecting more then two years before the light fails. It's not designed to be used like this and I understand that. But that being said, I'm good at fixing things and its a lamp not rocket science. As long as the main components continue to work. I'll be happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Complete garbage. Bostitch means nothing any longer.
reviews.reviewText: I paid more to upgrade to this Bostitch branded desk lamp. Bostitch went ultra cheap and zero thought or QC is applied to their product. This is a desk lamp, must have been around for at least the last 50 years yet Bostitch cannot send it with a mounting clamp that holds fast, or a lamp shade that stays put. The clamp pulls off every single time I attempt to adjust the lamp’s position. The clamp is so cheap and poorly made of cheap plastic without an anti-slip pad or teeth to bite, that it slides right off the surface it is clamped onto. When I touch the lamp to make an adjustment, the lamp shade falls off and hangs on the light bulb. We can do better, I don’t trust the brand any longer. Pay half as much and take your chances with the no name brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice, Efficient Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Bostitch makes good lamps. With this one, the base is heavy enough that there's no worry about 'tip over'. The lamp is very nice and has a good price-point. I wish the lower 'elbow' had more mobility, but for the price, the lamp is fine. The positions lock in place and stay locked.Easy to assemble, no tools required; the cord is long enough to go halfway across a room.
No es verdad que sea toda de metal, la mariposa para apretar el cabezal es de plástico. Pero en términos generales está bien construida y trae incluido un foco de luz de día. Recomendable.
Took two minutes to set up might work great very sturdy
My only grumble is that the shade is easy to knock off. A few drops of crazy glue fixed that. Overall a good lamp for the price.

reviews.reviewTitle: So close to being a great buy, but not good enough.
reviews.reviewText: Pros:- Light is bright- Good options for positioning.- Bulb included- Adjustment screws hold wellCons:- Base is poorly designed and can fall off of the surface that it is clamped to.- Base has no locking bolt to keep lamp from swiveling out of position.- Lamp rests loosely in base and can fall out if moved or jarred.Great design overall, but missing some little things that make a big difference in usability and quality.
